content.description: "I accuse the war office of having led a vile campaign in the press in order to misdirect public opinion and cover up its sins.
content.question: "I accuse the first court-martial of having violated all human rights in condemning a prisoner on testimony kept secret from him."The quotation above by Emile Zola was written to

choices.label: protest against the trials of the Jacobin government during the Reign of Terror
defend Napoleon after his defeat at the Battle of Waterloo
protect the reputation of General de Gaulle during the Second World War
challenge the behavior of the French army during the Vichy regime in the Second World War
attack the actions of the French military during the Dreyfus Affair

content.answer: attack the actions of the French military during the Dreyfus Affair
